title: Loot Capsule Bugged?
body:
Opened an honor capsule and received 3 keys, 1 warwick shard and 1 gray warwick skin shard, but only the keys showed up in my inventory. This also happened a while ago (2-3 weeks?) with a ward skin, which I also never received.

I have tried relaunching the client several times.

replies.body: Hey there, it looks like Grey Warwick automatically unlocked for you.  It was not a shard, but a permanent.  :)  Same thing usually with skin wards.  Grats!
